segments.text: Hello , Room Reservation Service . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This is Mrs.Davinson . I'd like to reserve a two-room suite for tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Yeah , There are two such rooms left . May I have your name please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mrs.Davinson . Mary Davison . M-A-R-Y , mary . D-A-V-I-N-S-O-N . Davison .
segments.speaker: S2
